item.title: UE Procedure Related to Sidelink(36.213)
item.description: PSSCH UE procedure for transmitting PSSCH UE procedure for receiving PSSCH UE procedure for determining resource block pool for PSSCH in sidelink transmission mode 3 and 4 PSCCH UE procedure for transmitting PSCCH For sidelink transmission mode 3, the UE shall determine the subframes and resource blocks for transmitting SCI format 1 as follows: + SCI format 1 is transmitted in two PRBs per slot in each subframe where the corresponding PSSCH is transmitted + If UE receives DCI format 5A in subframe $n$ with CRC scrambled by SL-V-RNTI, one transmission of PSCCH is in the PSCCH resources $L{Init}$ in the first subframe that is included in $(t{0}^{SL},t{1}^{SL},t{2}^{SL},…))$ and that starts not earlier than $T{DL}-\frac{N{TA}}{2}\cdot Ts+(4+m)\cdot 10^{-3}$.
